item.title: Command help
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

Well i am using 317 devo and my “pnpc” command is not working there are no errors but every time you use it it makes you npc 0 not the number you type in if anyone could help me that would be nice.

[code]
if (command.startsWith(“pnpc”) && (playerRights >= 1)) {
try {
int newNPC = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(5));

			if ((newNPC <= 10000) && (newNPC >= 0)) {
				npcId = newNPC;
				isNpc = true;
				updateRequired = true;
				appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
			} else {
				sendMessage("No such P-NPC.");
			}
		} catch (Exception e) {
			sendMessage("Wrong Syntax! Use as ::pnpc #");
		}
	}[/code]

Read full topic
